emailMaxLength: Email must be at most 100 characters
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
passwordDigit: Password must contain at least one digit
passwordSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character
fieldMinLength: Field must be at least 3 characters
fieldMaxMength: Field must be at most 50 characters
fieldShape: Field must follow the required format
